title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Konosuke_Uda
transformers_text: K no suke Uda Uda K no suke born 1966 in Shizuoka is a Japanese director of anime He graduated from the Animation Department of Tokyo Design Academy and worked as a freelancer at Toei Animation His most notable work has been as a series director for One Piece including two of its feature films 1 Other works directed include Ginga e Kickoff Rainbow Fireflies Maj in Bone and Days He currently works mainly for MAPPA This article about one or more people who work in the anime industry is a stub You can help Wikipedia by expanding it This Japanese artist related article is a stub You can help Wikipedia by expanding it
